articles.author: Ravi Hari
articles.title: Euclid telescope kicks off on July 1 to unravel dark matter mystery - Moneycontrol
articles.description: According to the European Space Agency, the mysterious 'dark' components of the cosmos are thought to be the cause of the Universe's accelerating expansion, but their nature and origin are not known yet.
articles.content: Euclid, the cosmological mission of the European Space Agency (ESA), is all set for launch on July 1. The spacecraft will lift off from the Astrotech facility located near Cape Canaveral in Florida, … [+2664 chars]
